overview:
Jerry is a seasoned executive in the software and technology area. His General Manager and CEO level experiences at Checkmate Electronics, IBM and Apple Computer served to position him as a leader in the systems, software and systems integration service marketing arena. Later in Jerry’s career he served on various public boards that have successfully developed a “best of breed” profile in the software and implementation services area. He completed his undergraduate and graduate studies in business at Wayne State University and University of Michigan respectively.

Serving as the President of Impetus, Jerry focuses on the development, satisfaction and expansion of client relationships for offshore services. As software companies seek partnerships with established, quality partners, Jerry’s organization serves as the primary point for understanding their requirements and providing the delivery systems that meet and exceed client expectations.
